org.trianacode.gui.windows

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.windows.Input
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Input
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Just calls the JOptionPane with the appropriate values for the particular input you want to get from the user. You use it like this :- 

         double inp = Input.aNumber("Enter the value for beta");
 String s = Input.aString("Enter your name");
    etc....
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
